title: I Didn’t Save You To Get Proposed To
summary: As usual, I was going home from work. But suddenly I had an accident. Before I left, I heard someone’s voice in my head. [I’m Elsia Artise, please save him, please, you can do it!!] That was the last thing I was aware of before fainting. After opening my eyes, I found myself in a different place… This place was in a novel that I read before that accident happened! I already possess the body of Elsia, who will die as soon as the novel begins. There’s only one thing I can do to survive. It was following Elsia’s request and distorting the original! First, it was to save Ixion, her unrequited love, who was assassinated and killed. “Prince, I am here to warn you of the assassination that will take place today.” I succeeded in saving him by using information from the original, I just want to live a comfortable life that has nothing to do with the original. Until I received a letter… “I owe you a lot of favors. I hope you will come to the capital immediately because I want to repay this favor with a marriage.” Ixion’s marriage proposal, which I thought was the end of our relationship. “Prince, I didn’t save you so you could propose to me?” Can Elsia peacefully refuse his marriage proposal and return to her comfortable life?

title: The Blooming Violet in the Back Garden
summary:
On the day the streets and flowers burn, Violeta, a kitchen assistant, wakes up as a saint who is destined to defeat absolute evil. She avoids the corrupt priests and chooses to be the adopted daughter of the king's sword, the Marquis, but just because she was born from a humble region she is treated coldly by the priests.

Among them, the affectionate Daniel is their only consolation. However, at the moment when everyone in the aristocracy rejected her, it was not he who reached out, but Esselmund, the successor to the cold and ruthless Marquis.

"You don't need to do anything, Violeta just needs to stand still and blossom into the little flowers and chaos."

title: Young Love
summary:
"From now on, is it okay for me to have an ‘adult relationship’ with you, Young Lady?"

Yui Amagi is the daughter of a yakuza family who longs for a "normal life." Her dream of living on her own finally comes true… or so she thought. But her assigned bodyguard—who also happens to be her fiancé—Ichika Izumo, the Wakagashira (Underboss) of the Amagi group, insists that "it’s only natural for me to be here," while smoking a cigarette as if he owns the place.

Yui doesn’t actually dislike Ichika (in fact, she secretly likes him), but she doesn’t want a romance arranged by her parents. Without realizing her own feelings, she decides to spite him by joining a group blind date.

However, once the party starts, she feels completely out of place and ends up depressed. To make matters worse, one of the men there takes advantage of her vulnerability and tries to take her to a hotel…!?

"You dare join a group date when you already have me, your fiancé?"

An impatient yandere Underboss × a stubborn young lady, caught in an overly intense and sweet “awakening cohabitation love story”… ♪

title: Legendary Youngest Son of the Marquis House
summary:
After getting revenge on the Thulcaan Empire, Jack Valantier took his last breath. But just when he thinks it's all over, he finds himself transported back to when he was 14!

From his negligent and wicked family to his loyal servant and caring sister, it's all just as he had remembered. But this time, Jack is armed to the teeth with decades of experience from his previous life! He's ready to give them hell, and those that have wronged him will pay dearly.

Because this time, he's invincible.

title: The Tutorial is Too Hard
summary:
Lee Hojae had given up his life as a pro gamer, until one day he received a mysterious message: 

"Congratulations! You’ve been invited to the Tutorial World."

Intrigued, he enters the game and confidently chooses Hell difficulty, but soon learns that he is trapped there. With a mere 0.01% survival rate, Hojae must somehow overcome the game’s agonizing challenges to figure out the real reason he was invited.

This tutorial may be tough, but its secrets are what’s truly hellacious.

title: Regressing with the King’s Power
summary:
In a world where one's worth is determined by how powerful their skill is, Taehyeon is 35, unawakened, and barely able to scrape by as a pack bearer for monster hunters. 

But when a mysterious being calling itself the King gives him a skill of his own, Taehyeon gets a second chance at life. 

Now he’s back in high school and armed with Gluttony, a skill that allows him to block and absorb the skills of others!

title: Secret Family
summary:
Multi-million dollars in inheritance, but where is the money? 

Anna Willson arrives at her late grandfather's country villa expecting a holiday. Instead, she finds secret messages left for her by her grandfather and a bunch of suspicious people. Can she follow her grandfather’s clues to uncover her family's secrets and secure her inheritance before anyone else?

title: Black Killer Whale Baby
summary:
Calypso has experienced repeated reincarnation, and this is her 4th reincarnation. 

In her previous lives, she always died before she reached the age of 22 and returned to where everything started. During her 3rd life, she discovered that when a dragon goes on a rampage, it distorts dimensions. 

Determined to use this knowledge, she plans to exploit the dragon’s power to return to her original world. Currently, Calypso finds herself in a childcare story, where she encounters a man who she believes to be her father but the latter doesn’t recognize her. 

Seeking his help, Calypso involves her "father" and family in her quest, turning them into unwitting allies in her journey.

---
At age 3, Calypso Aquasiadel is the most outstanding genius her family's ever seen, and no wonder... She's actually a modern girl who's been reborn into the same novel thrice! This time around, Calypso's determined to harness the powers of the mysterious dragon duke and send herself back home. The only problem is, she'll first need to earn the respect of her hardened family to survive until then! Can Calypso win their approval and even their hearts? Or is this life doomed for another do-over?

title: The Saintess Became the Northern Grand Duke’s Daughter
summary: Born Again to Escape, and to Heal a Broken Heart Liriette, blessed with divine power that could heal others through her blood, had spent her short life as nothing more than a tool for a cruel High Priest. Her end came quietly, used and discarded. But one day, she opened her eyes… and she was 10 years old again. "This time, I will never let the horrors of my past repeat themselves." Determined to escape the clutches of the High Priest, Liriette sought refuge in the farthest corner of the empire, with none other than Duke Windsorice, the ruler of the cold and mysterious North. "I can heal your eyes. Please, let me stay by your side." At first, it was simply a desperate attempt to escape her dreadful fate. Yet, as time passed, her hopes and dreams began to grow beyond mere survival. "Would you… become my daughter?" With trembling hands and a soft voice, Liriette asked, "What would you gain from me as your daughter?" The Duke's lips curled into the faintest smile. "A kind and beautiful daughter." Follow the heartwarming journey of a lonely girl who finds her home and happiness as the beloved daughter of the empire’s coldest Duke. Watch as the once-unfeeling ruler becomes the ultimate doting father, melting the icy North with his newfound love.

title: I Ended Up Raising the Seed of Evil
The Youngest Daughter of the Villainous Duke
summary:
After passing out drunk on a cold night, I awake as a nameless young orphan girl. But she's not just any girl, she's a character from a novel I wrote in high school! Abused and sold at auction as a slave, I'm suddenly rescued by my father, Duke Henry Wensgrey, the story's original villain. Far from the wicked character I created, he's now a total fool for his daughter. But our relationship isn't the only thing that's changed, and I soon discover that this world isn't anything like what I wrote!

---
I possessed a character in a novel I had never finished writing when I was in high school. And then now I have the body of a supporting character instead of the main character. It was a seven-year-old orphan girl with no name… Having to suffer the abuse of others, until I got really tired and ran away from that place. But I was captured and sold as a slave. I thought my life was over… But the person who saved me was the novel's most prominent villain, Henriette.

He treats the emperor like a puppet. A person who has a reputation for being extremely cruel in the original and has a hobby of cutting the throat of aristocrats. …Is he my biological father? But other than that terrible reputation, living with him wasn’t bad either.

"Okay, my daughter. You can do whatever you want. If you want something, everyone in the family will do what you want."

Wait… I didn't write a novel like that in the first place?

title: I Don’t Want to Work!
summary:
After being defeated and captured, the dragon slayer Leon became a captive of the Silver Dragon Queen. With the awareness of death, he used forbidden magic to curse the queen, but unexpectedly, the queen lost control. 

He thought that this would make the queen live with shame for the rest of her life, and it would be worthy of the dragon slayer's mission. 

But two years later, when Leon opened his eyes, next to him was a little dragon girl with a tail...

title: The Count’s Youngest Son is A Player
summary:
Dohyeon is a top-ranking gamer in Connect, an immersive VR game that is overrun by corrupt guilds. After being murdered for discovering a mythical item, he wakes up as Lord Raul Ashton, an NPC in a closed beta version of Connect. 

Now the sole player in this realm, he decides to use his knowledge from his past life to prevent the downfall of House Ashton and unlock unprecedented powers. For Dohyeon, Connect is no longer just a game—it’s now his reality. 

Join him as he embarks on a thrilling quest to reshape his fate!

title: The Great Mage of the Hero’s Party Reincarnates
summary:
At age 13, the genius wizard Rin embarked on a journey with Lista and the hero party to defeat the great evil known as “the Abyss,” which sought to plunge the world into chaos. But as the battle grew more intense, Rin’s body succumbed to the dark poison of the Abyss, putting his life in grave danger.

With the words “I’ll come back,” Rin’s soul entered a forced dormancy, only to reawaken 300 years later as a noble boy. Starting his second life in a peaceful world, Rin discovers that on one side of the world, the destined forces of darkness are beginning to stir once more.

---
The battle with the arch-nemesis resumes after 300 years. The genius wizard, Lynn, embarks on a grand journey, at the age of 13. Together with the party of heroes, led by Esther, they aim to defeat the great evil “Abyss” that intends to throw the world into chaos. However, the battles becomes increasingly fierce and at the final moment, Lynn succumbs to the dark poison of the “Abyss”. Leaving behind the words “I’ll be back”, Lynn’s soul falls dormant for 300 years, before being resurrected into the body of a boy of noble birth. Thus begins his second life in a peaceful world. But in the meantime, a dark force is brooding once again, threatening to plunge the world into turmoil once again.

---
The warrior Lista heard the rumors about the great magician Rin, hailed as a genius for becoming the youngest 4-star mage. Lista recruited him to join her party to fight the forces of the void but, right before the final battle, Rin’s body succumbed to the void’s dark poison. As he drew his last breath, Rin cast an immortality spell, encasing his body in ice and promising Lista that he would return. Rin kept his promise and returned after 300 years--but reborn in the body of a noble boy.

title: The Villainess Has Changed
summary: Alban realized he had been reincarnated as the villainous noble in a certain novel. Just as he began training in swordsmanship and magic to avoid defeat by the protagonist, he learned that Leticia, a noblewoman surrounded by nasty rumors, was to become his wife! He was nervous about what kind of "evil woman" she might be... but, upon meeting her, he found an incredibly pure girl — angelic, and exactly his type! Alban, forgetting all about avoiding his doom due to her adorableness, resolved to take revenge on the mastermind who had set up his beloved wife! Using their villainous reputation to their advantage, they set out to lure the culprit, but... will they succeed?

title: The Regretful Villainess Is Happy Because She Got Divorced
summary: After waking up as the villainess in a dark fantasy romance novel, Marlena was destined to be nothing more than the cold male lead’s scorned wife. Wanting no part in his cruel love story, she demanded a divorce. But just as she begins to enjoy her new life, both her ex-husband and the second male lead start chasing after her!

title: In This Life, I’m Resigning From Being a Villain Queen
summary: "Congratulations, host, for completing the ultimate mission to kill the Bloody Queen, Reina. Guard leader Max's favorability has reached maximum, and your charm index has reached maximum..." Hearing this sudden electronic chime, I should be happy too. That is, if I'm not Reina. After death, Reina returns to five years ago, knowing that her loyal guard, gentle fiancé, and tsundere brother will all soon backstab her and fall under the host's spell. This time, Reina decides to just run away.

title: Do Your Best and Regret
summary: No summary available.

title: I’ll Be The Matriarch In This Life
summary:
"Juliana, your fiancé has been decided.”
At that moment, the frail daughter of an earl awakened to a shocking truth—within her resided the soul of the infamous "Cold-Hearted Emperor" Julius. A man whose ruthless conquests left behind mountains of corpses and an empire under his iron rule. 

Now, reborn as a delicate young noble girl, Julius finds himself in a seemingly peaceful era. But beneath the surface lurk corruption, poverty, and disease, all exploited by scheming villains. With the wisdom and might of a former emperor, Juliana will not stand idly by. The young lady who once ruled as a tyrant is ready to cleanse the empire once more—this time, with her tiny hands. 

A dark yet thrilling tale of power, justice, and a battle against the hidden evils of the empire begins!

title: A Corporate Underling Who Excels at Work
summary:
Chae Gyeong-jun, who gave up both college and his dreams due to the IMF crisis, once again faces despair in front of his grandmother's sudden hospitalization fees.

But then, a mysterious benefactor steps in to cover the hospital costs for his family...

"Who would provide support that doesn't help them at all, and why?"

In search of an answer, Gyeong-jun heads to Taeseong.

title: The Thousand Faces Actor
summary:
"What do you think people will end up calling him?"

Someone asked. But no one had an answer.

A transcendent being has appeared in the world.
And a new chapter in film history begins.

title: The Joseon prince went to America and didn’t return
summary: Due to a sudden natural disaster, Park Byung-jun, a Korean-American lobbyist, finds himself reincarnated as Yi Kang, the second son of Emperor Gojong of the Korean Empire, at the moment of his death. Armed with his knowledge of the original history, he crosses over to the United States and begins his own new business to amass wealth!

title: Becoming A Legendary Ace Employee
summary: Kim Tae-seok, who worked on a construction site, receives a notice of passing the document screening for the major company El Sung. At the same time, a message pops up in front of him: 'You have entered the path to becoming a regular employee tutorial. Would you like to proceed?' Follow Kim Tae-seok's struggle to become the legendary all-around employee in this corporate adventure!

title: Chronicles of the Lazy Sovereign
summary: Lin Tian, a genius game designer, was ordered to be executed because he knew too much of the company secrets. At a critical moment, he was betrayed by his lover Luo Yue and was killed in the jungle. When he woke up, he found he became a low-level monster in the jungle. In order to avenge the past, the male protagonist started on his path as a Monster in The Jungle.

title: The Sister Who Once Hated Me Now Loves Me
I Became the Stepmother of an Irrevocable Dark Family
summary:
I became the stepmother of Rebecca, the 5-year-old wicked girl who planned to commit all kinds of troubles because of her limited time due to an illness.

Soon, I’m going to get severely hurt because of Rebecca.

In this second life of mine, I can’t believe I’m going to be crippled and unable to live properly for the rest of my life.

As expected, the Duke’s appearance exceeded my expectations.

“Get lost.”

I just went to your side, is there a need to swear?

“My mom? As if! Such a rotten being. Get out of my house!”

Splashing water at me, why does my daughter have a mother-in-law style that is typically seen in a morning drama?

“Don’t cross the line. I don’t like you.”

Even the Duke, who brought me over himself, loathes me.

***

Nasty and cheap humans.

I’m out of here!

I made up my mind and started to do what I wanted.

After taking a little revenge on a kid who does not even apologize, let alone feel remorseful, all that’s left is to run away….

“Mom, you can’t live without me, can you? I’ll grant you a special place next to me!”

…No. I don’t want to be next to you.

Even that girl’s father, the Duke, the man who hated me to death, was acting strangely.

“I hate you so much. So I’m going to put you next to me.”

title: Loved by The Dead
summary: In the Yamatoba Empire, where two races, humans and night demons, have existed since time immemorial. Iku, whose hair and eyes are as pale as white snow, is mistreated by her family because of her strange, demon-like appearance. She is treated as little more than a servant until the day she is sold to a man for money, a fate she thought impossible to escape from... One day, however, the next head of a prominent family, Subaru, learns of Iku's secret and offers her a marriage proposal. Though it is a political marriage, the two, both burdened with a damaged past, gradually become attracted to each other...?

title: The Support Ate it All
summary:
The protagonist, who was enjoying the RPG game Dragon Slayer Academy, succeeds in raising 1,000 S-class heroes as the strongest supporter in the game.

One day, a mysterious quest window appears in front of him, and he is presented with a hidden quest that allows him to raise EX-class heroes that surpass S-class heroes.

Upon accepting the quest, he finds himself transported into the game world of Dragon Slayer Academy...

title: Childhood Friend of the Zenith
summary:
Kazuma Suzuki was just your average high schooler—until his childhood friend, Rua Takayashiki, a beautiful, sharp-tongued girl who also happened to be the granddaughter of the school chairman and the nation’s top idol, cut all ties with him using a line straight out of a drama.

Forced into submission for years as her so-called childhood friend, Kazuma decides it’s finally time for his first-ever rebellion. He’s done playing lapdog. This time, he’s taking back his freedom—and aiming for a normal school life.

Escaping a powerful beauty like her is easier said than done...

title: 108 Women
Revenge of the Iron-Blooded Sword Hound
summary:
Raised to kill like a pack of loyal hounds, the Baskerville children took countless lives as a band of fearsome assassins.

Despite being the shunned illegitimate son of the brood, Vikir served his family faithfully, only to meet his untimely demise at his father’s hands. But when he is inexplicably reborn with a second chance at life, Vikir, armed with the memories and knowledge of his past, swears to rise above the pack and take his revenge.

This time, he's ready to bite the hand that feeds.

title: Another Woman’s Man
summary:
Jung Eun-ae, whose life goal is to marry Jin-hong—an undeniably perfect boyfriend—and to build a family anyone would envy.

Growing weary of her boyfriend, who fails to fill her loneliness,

she finds herself drawn to her senior, Lee Jae-won,

who, despite his seemingly indifferent demeanor, is surprisingly considerate.

Despite knowing that he is a married man,

she begins to feel an attraction toward him,

and in order to have him,

she consciously—or perhaps unconsciously—starts to shatter her own moral beliefs one by one...

title: Surviving the Haunted School
My bias gets on the last train
summary:
“Meeting her on the last train again today, if only I could talk to her!”
College student Lee Yeowoon works late and takes the last train every night.
Each time, he runs into Shin Haein, a woman carrying a guitar. As if by chance, as if by fate,
the two keep meeting and discover that their favorite artist is the indie musician “Long Afternoon.” They gradually grow closer and so the story began.

title: I Became the Cure for the Tyrant in the Waste Novel
summary: I transmigrated into an explicit 19+ novel as the villain. And it happened to be at the moment when I was about to take over the Emperor on the bed. Until then, I thought I had died without moving a muscle. Enoch Philip de Harte was a tyrant who hated any contact with others. But he insists that I am the cure to melt the ice in his heart and follows me around…

title: Honestly, This 13th Regression Is Getting Tough
Heart-Pounding Cute Poem
summary: Struggling streamer **Doyeon Choi** downloads a mysterious dating sim game, ***Heart-Racing Ghost Dating Sim***, only to find himself trapped in a deadly loop-- where the love interests are real-life ghosts with unresolved deaths. From haunted highways to murder cases, **Doyeon** must navigate a world where romance, horror, and mystery collide. Every wrong move could cost him his life...again.

title: Player Who Returned 10,000 Years Later
summary:
Oh Kangwoo the Demon King has had it with ruling over Hell and wants to return to Earth. 

But when he finally gets there, not only are his powers sealed, but the Earth he once knew has turned into an MMORPG free-for-all. 

Dimensional gates have appeared all over the world, and "players" enter them to make a living by hunting monsters. If Kangwoo wants to survive in this dangerous game, he's going to have to level up, and fast. 

But for this demon king, hell on earth might be worse than Hell itself!

title: The Knight King Who Returned with a God
summary:
I returned to Earth after hunting demons in the otherworld for three hundred years. However, I did not return alone.

**Official Translations**
[Simplified Chinese](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/yushentongguideqishiwang/list?title_no=2594) 
[Traditional Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/the-king-of-knights-returns-with-god/list?title_no=5491)

title: The Great Mage Returns After 4000 Years
summary:
Lucas Trowman was the greatest archmage in history until he was condemned by Demigod to spend eternity losing his mind. But 4,000 years later, he’s thrust back into this world, into the body of Frei Blake, the weakest, most un-talented student at the prestigious Westroad Academy for mages. After all this time, the world of magic has barely progressed. Could this be the work of Demigod? Determined to find out, Lucas seeks to reach the highest levels of power once again and get his revenge.

---

title: The Great Mage Returns After 4000 Years
summary:
Lucas Trowman was the greatest archmage in history until he was condemned by Demigod to spend eternity losing his mind. But 4,000 years later, he’s thrust back into this world, into the body of Frei Blake, the weakest, most un-talented student at the prestigious Westroad Academy for mages. After all this time, the world of magic has barely progressed. Could this be the work of Demigod? Determined to find out, Lucas seeks to reach the highest levels of power once again and get his revenge.

title: One Husband Is Enough
summary: Getting reincarnated into the world of a novel is never easy, but possessing a doomed bride on her way down the aisle to marry a murderous emperor is just unfair! Now, the newly reincarnated Angelica has no choice but to learn to survive the whims of her new husband, Emperor Ranielo… Well, at least until he falls for his fated love interest and she can slip away unnoticed. But as the days pass, Ranielo’s interest in her only grows. Can this tyrant be tamed, or will Angelica find that some destinies can’t be unwritten?

title: The Duke’s Obsession with His Wife
summary: No summary available.

title: In the Grasp of a Loving Yet Possessive Male Lead
I Saw the Future With the Killer Grand Duke
summary: Today, I am getting married for the second time to my husband, as the daughter of the imperial family he hates. Pretending to be good, pretending to be weak, pretending to be poor. I possessed Gabriella Nashert, a villainess who possesses the ‘three-piece combo’ that enrages the readers. In order to escape her scheduled death, she asked Ernst Esqes, the Northern Grand Duke, to marry her on a contract. The three years spent with her husband, away from where the original incident took place, were quite sweet. Even though it ended with my death. "If you and I meet in our next life, please marry me again." However, when I woke up again, I found out that I became the daughter of the family who’s responsible for my death?

title: Worthless Profession: Dragon Tamer
summary: Combining reality with a gaming world where ferocious beasts roam freely, filled with numerous mysteries and dungeons. In order to defend against the onslaught of these beasts, everyone undergoes class transfers and crazily levels up. On the day of his transfer, Lu Fan becomes a hidden class – Dragon Tamer. However, due to the immense strength of dragons, it is deemed impossible for anyone to tame them, earning Dragon Tamer the reputation of being the most useless class. Fortunately, he awakens the Super Treasure Map System. As Lu Fan, with his mighty dragon, sweeps through everything, the entire world trembles.

title: Look-Alike Daughter
summary: Beautiful and intelligent, Somyung Gil has tirelessly strived to fulfill her mother's vision of the perfect daughter. However, when her less-than-perfect younger brother is tragically found drowned in a river, doubts plague Somyung's heart. She begins to suspect that their mother might be responsible for the unspeakable act. From then on, her paramount goal becomes escaping her mother's grasp, while all her mother wants is for Somyung to experience the perfect life she herself was denied. Will Somyung ever truly find her freedom?

title: I’m Actually a Cultivation Bigshot
summary: Li Nianfan transmigrated to an immortal cultivation world as a mortal. Knowing that he could never become a cultivator, he decided to live an ordinary life. But unbeknownst to him, his dog became a mighty Yaoguai king by watching him draw and write; the tree he planted in the backyard became the tree of the world by listening to tunes he played; a passerby he met, who gained enlightenment from the chitchat with him, became a Taoist sage and started a new era...

title: Evolution Begins With A Big Tree
summary: One minute, he was choking on water, and the next, he found himself in a canyon and turned into a willow tree! Before he could reconcile with this new sad reality, the world decided to throw him another curveball. With the return of spirit energy, every living thing started to mutate, and his life was soon turned into a game of survival. Luckily, he was gifted with the ability of infinite evolution. But was it really a blessing? Or was it also a curse in disguise?

title: After the School Belle Dumped Me, I Became a Martial Arts God
